kesako.common

Class FacetSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.common.FacetSearch

  • public class FacetSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement the facet-search mechanism.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

    • Method Detail

      • doSearch

        public int doSearch(java.lang.String query)
        Execute the research and update the data
        Parameters:
        query - query of the research
        Returns:
        a flag that indicates the status.
        • RESULTS: indicates that there is at least one result
        • NO_RESULT: indicates that there is no result.
        • RESULT_ERROR: indicates that an error occurred during the search.
